## hpr1785 :: 54 - LibreOffice Impress - Creating a Presentation

 
Having looked at the theory of building a good presentation, now we can look at the mechanics of how to build a presentation. This will take you step-by-step through the creation process and get you ready to create your own awesome presentations.
For more go to https://www.ahuka.com/?page_id=1188


Links


https://www.ahuka.com/?page_id=1188
